product_name: Chaco Hobo Flip EcoTread Flip-Flops - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Chaco Hobo Flip Ecotread flip-flops feature microsuede footbeds and arch support for lasting comfort during warm days at the beach, by the lake or in the backyard. Polyester webbing straps dry quickly; soft, water-ready microsuede toe posts and footbeds offer great next-to-skin comfort. Shaped polyurethane midsoles, along with heel risers, and heel cups provide all-day arch support. Toss into washing machine for easy cleaning or clean by hand with scrub brush, baking soda and water; avoid bleach and air dry. Nonmarking Chaco EcoTread rubber outsoles contain 25% recycled rubber and offer excellent all-around traction. Closeout.
short_description: The Chaco Hobo Flip Ecotread flip-flops feature microsuede footbeds and arch support for lasting comfort during warm days at the beach, by the lake or in the backyard.
